remarks: The support of a mapping of a scalar multiplication with a function of scalars is finite if the support of the function of scalars is finite. (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2019.)
statement:
scmsuppfi.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` M ) $.
scmsuppfi.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
scmsuppfi $p |- ( ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P ( Base ` M ) ) /\ A e. ( R ^m V ) /\ ( A supp ( 0g ` S ) ) e. Fin ) -> ( ( v e. V |-> ( ( A ` v ) ( .s ` M ) v ) ) supp ( 0g ` M ) ) e. Fin ) $.
$d A v $.
$d M v $.
$d R v $.
$d V v $.
